title: Suggestion of Serif Displays
content:
Hi everybody, this is my first post.  
I will develop a Serif Display to my post Graduation final project. It will be projected for a Craft magazine and I am looking for some good typefaces that I could use as a reference for my studying.  
Do you have any suggestions?

Thanks in advance,

cheers,
author: mskulpas

comments.content:
You shouldn't start with a list of fonts, but an idea of what your typeface needs to do.

hhp

You are totally right, Hrant, I forgot to say that: the typeface is supposed to look elegant for big titles, like 48 pt size, for magazines of Arts & Crafts.  
The aims of my project have to do with unbracketed serifs, certain contrast, humanist axis and a x-height relatively small. At first, I will develop a regular weight and later, variations like bold and italic.  
So far, this is all I have.

Thanks again,
